Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
The [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDCMSSwordOfLight],5th Sword of Light]] made an abortive assault on the [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] system of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Conroe],Conroe]] in mid November.  Even the vaunted [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDCMSSorensonsSabres],Sorenson's Sabers]] couldn't pull a victory from the situation.



It looks like the independence movement on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Norn(Verthandi)],Verthandi]] has taken a critical blow, with their leaders killed during a poorly planed assault on the capital city of Regis.  However, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS]] troops continue to face minor armed resistance - apparently from some organized militia units backed by mercenaries.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
With the year ending, we here at [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCNB],CNB]] reflect back on another year of war and violence and can only hope and pray that the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great Houses]] will cease their power struggles and begin to reflect inward on their people.  We also look back at the effort of ComStar in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]], with multiple [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHPG],HPG stations]] being built to help bridge the communication gap between the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] and the Periphery, and new water filtration systems bringing clean and pure water to those in need.  We wish all that hear this message prosperity and safety in these uncertain times.





This has been the CNB December broadcast.
